reviewText: Played this for a military family course, and many of the participants were in tears. They discussed this as extremely accurate and moving. A must watch for anyone with military friends, or who is doing counseling with the military.

Thank you so much for making this dvd! It is everything I expected and I learned so much from it. There is so much more to the story on a very personal level too much to write...but I am very pleased with this dvd.

This series is EXCELLENT!  For those people that think this series might be a downer , it's not at all.  The realism and sincerity are genuine.  To see what effort it takes to "fit " back into the America they fought for shows the real hero that is in each and every one of them.
God bless them all.  We are so blessed to share this world with them.
